title: Brecon Beacons National Park
name: Sgwd yr Eira Waterfall
directions: From Lamb Hotel on A4059 at Penderyn, follow the road and then footpath to the river,
content: This is the waterfall you can walk behind, as it has a shallow cave behind the curtain of water. A must see if you are visiting South Wales. The path from the Lamb is recently renewed and easy to follow,  The waterfall is a 30 minute walk from Penderyn. The steps down to the river are steep and need care.
